name: test_e2e_with_logs[051_SQLI_STACK_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_STACK_002` |
| **Name** | Stacked query INSERT INTO attack |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | stacked_queries |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'; INSERT INTO users VALUES ('hacker','password'); --`
- **Encoded**: `'%3B%20INSERT%20INTO%20users%20VALUES%20('hacker'%2C'password')%3B%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~42000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:34:13.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_STACK_002-1768052053244-hj7n5i pattern_id=SQLI_STACK_002 uri=/?q='%3B%20INSERT%20INTO%20users%20VALUES%20('hacker'%2C'password')%3B%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
